dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: academic credit name
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Name of this credit. This may have a direct relation to the combination of value and type fields.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: academic credit value
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The number of the credits. This is typically numeric, but string is used to cover cases such as fractional and unbounded.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: academic credit effective date
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Date and time that this credit value became effective. This is a similar concept to the effective date on enumerated values. When an expiration date has been specified, this field must be less than or equal to the expiration date.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: academic credit expiration date
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Date and time that this credit value expires. This is a similar concept to the expiration date on enumerated values. If specified, this should be greater than or equal to the effective date. If this field is not specified, then no expiration date has been

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: academic credit attributes
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: List of key/value pairs, typically used for dynamic attributes.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: academic credit type
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for a credit type.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: academic credit internal id
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Unique identifier for a credit value.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: The name of the letter grade

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: letter grade value
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: the value of the letter grade

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: letter grade scaleKey
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Identifier of the scale for this letter grade value.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: letter grade rank
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Rank of the letter grade value within the scale.

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: letter grade effectiveDate
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Date and time that this letter grade value became effective. T

dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:name: letter grade expirationDate
dict:fieldDescriptor.dict:desc: Date and time that this letter grade value expires.
